channel.title: Actually learn the Java programming language!
channel.description:
So many people in the runescape private server phenomenon know nothing about the language, they just learn off other peoples bad practices, such as following bad conventions.
They come to this community not knowing anything about the language, they download a source like Czar, they work on it and follow all the bad practices because they think it's the correct way to do things. They get errors, and don't know how to fix them, etc.
I think private servers would be so much better if people took the time to read Java docs, even if you think you're a really good programmer, I still advise you read them, you may learn something new.
Also, I'm not just saying that it just happens here, it happens in every runescape private server community.
http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial/

item.title: Actually learn the Java programming language!
item.dc:creator: @JaydenD12 JaydenD12
item.description:
@JaydenD12 wrote:

Chassy13:

I honestly know very minimum of the language. However, I am going to be studying it now. I’m coming from a fresh start and plan on working on it this summer. :rolleyes:

Glad to hear.

Read full topic

item.title: Actually learn the Java programming language!
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote="`Alec, post:4, topic:342383"][quote author=Lin link=topic=438752.msg3225253#msg3225253 date=1275517788]
stuff
[/quote]

hey hey hey

I just said you weren’t a “guru” and that half of the people in mitb that know c# are better than you. I made no claims of myself being experienced in c# whatsoever, and at the time you were made c# guru you definitely weren’t.

You just lived up to the title.

It’s like obama becoming the nobel peace prize winner, he just hasn’t lived up to it yet.

+if you look at the dates on those screenshots, most are recent.

+I was talking about java gurus in the first place

+Your rage when typing fucked up your grammar in the entire post.

+If you want me to “take back” what I said, it would be like when you apologize to someone insincerely, prove that you’re better then the people at mitb and I’ll hand over my ass on a silver platter.[/quote]
fuck off pls

Read full topic

except once they become a java guru they move on to mitb, then they cba to even think of rsps.

yeah a moparscaper becoming a java guru, good one…

A moparscaper got C# guru, so whats the difference?
[/quote]

Lin was a member since 2007, and he didn’t really ‘earn’ that emblem.

Most of the people at mitb are way better at C# then Lin, he just got it BECAUSE he’s a moparscaper.

It’s like hiring a black guy to impress the government.[/quote]lool, rep++ for orsm analogy

item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

runescape private server phenomenon
Far from. You want phenomenon you talk auto rune. Moparscape is shit compared to anything else. It's more of a "dieing era" because RS has become so easy that you don't need to play RSPS to get rares or levels.
zoltanman:

There’s no will power to learn the language. Mainly because a lot of users on this forum are so young.

Hey buddy. Couldn’t of said it better.

except once they become a java guru they move on to mitb, then they cba to even think of rsps.

yeah a moparscaper becoming a java guru, good one…

A moparscaper got C# guru, so whats the difference?
[/quote]

Lin was a member since 2007, and he didn’t really ‘earn’ that emblem.

Most of the people at mitb are way better at C# then Lin, he just got it BECAUSE he’s a moparscaper.

It’s like hiring a black guy to impress the government.[/quote]

http://img718.imageshack.us/img718/8355/johto17.png
http://img30.imageshack.us/img30/8797/johto12.png Million more where those came from
http://img242.imageshack.us/f/gbpoke.png/ Plenty more of those.
http://img11.imageshack.us/img11/7083/mmx3.png
http://img59.imageshack.us/img59/9160/gbdevstudio.png
http://img411.imageshack.us/img411/157/mmxt23.png
http://img27.imageshack.us/i/zole6.png/ And the rest of ZOLE’s screenies.

Ya cause that’s shit’s just plain easy. You couldn’t even figure out the basics of half my projects. There’s many more I didn’t list, such as my interface editor. But of course, that’s just easy common stuff, right?

item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

omg i was waiting for this since my first day
I already knew a thing or two about java, but I wanted to learn more so i joined private servers. I heard that rsps are out of java, so I decided to join. (no, I was a total noob when I didn’t know that runescape was java)

And yah, I’m learning heck alot of java
